tweet_text:
@StreetsblogNYC @Komanoff “
First, those costs shrink faster than the assumed reduction in trip volumes, reflecting the geometric relationship between traffic levels and congestion costs.” Is this because of the BPR equation? If I recall there’s an exponential in it

tweet_text: @GreenJennyJones The transphobia displayed in the responses to this tweet is appalling and I've reported some and it continues throughout their timeliness, they're obsessed. Are these your followers? Are they Greens?  If so I need to seriously rethink my political loyalty.

tweet_text:
@PlanOnfire It’s incredible that the self-discipline journey to reach my goals and has actually become my goal and led to fulfillment. 

The -process- has been just as fulfilling as the results that have come. Once you get a taste of this you’ll want more.
text_en: Its incredible that the self-discipline journey to reach my goals and has actually become my goal and led to fulfillment. The -process- has been just as fulfilling as the results that have come. Once you get a taste of this youll want more.
